00038 class CWebServer;

00041 class CWebSocket : public wxSocketClient {
00042     public:
00043         CWebSocket(CWebServerBase *parent);
00044         
00045         void OnError();
00046         void OnLost();
00047 
00048         void OnInput();
00049         void OnOutput();
00050 
00051         void OnRequestReceived(char* pHeader, char* pData, uint32 dwDataLen);
00052 
00053         void SendContent(const char* szStdResponse, const void* pContent, uint32 dwContentSize);
00054         void SendData(const void* pData, uint32 dwDataSize);
00055         void SendHttpHeaders(const char * szType, bool use_gzip, uint32 content_len, int session_id);
00056         
00057         CWebServerBase *m_pParent;
00058     
00059         class CChunk {
00060             public:
00061                 char* m_pData;
00062                 char* m_pToSend;
00063                 uint32 m_dwSize;
00064             
00065                 CChunk* m_pNext;
00066                 ~CChunk() { if (m_pData) delete[] m_pData; }
00067         };
00068 
00069         CChunk *m_pHead; // tails of what has to be sent
00070         CChunk *m_pTail;
00071         
00072         bool m_IsGet, m_IsPost;
00073         char *m_Cookie;
00074         char *m_pBuf;
00075         uint32 m_dwBufSize;
00076         uint32 m_dwRecv;
00077         uint32 m_dwHttpHeaderLen;
00078         uint32 m_dwHttpContentLen;
00079 };
